1.title: The Gown Rush
1.plot: It's the annual Gown Rush sale at VOWs and hundreds of brides flock to the store for the big event! But with over 800 gowns to choose from, and very little time to spare, each bride must make a decision today or risk walking out the door empty handed.

2.title: When Only One Gown Will Do
2.plot: Joanna's strict budget threatens the dress vision she's always imagined. Desiree's gown expectations may not be realistic on her $600 budget, and Carol renews her vows in the gown of her dreams at her 50th wedding anniversary.

3.title: Champagne Gowns on a Beer Budget
3.plot: Bride Kerri hopes to find a sexy dress that will match her big personality for her big day. Young mom and bride to be, Alyssa struggles to see past her baby bump. Fashionista Lexi returns to the store to pick up her drastically altered gown.

4.title: Changes and Challenges
4.plot: Jasmine is determined to find a form-fitting, beaded gown on her tight budget. Brianna deals with her opinionated sister during her appointment, and Alida is anxious her dramatic dress alteration won't come out the way she's envisioned.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Bride Jennifer faces tough gown opposition from her penny pinching mother while bride Ashley and her mom battle over a gown that shows too much bust. Meanwhile, Jen's little sister thinks she's the only one that knows bridal!

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Noelle hopes to find a gown that combines her fashionsta and hippie vibe. Alexis has traveled from South Carolina in hopes to find a glamorous, Hollywood-inspired dress for her big day. Sherri refuses to settle for anything but one specific dress.

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Bride Brittany is looking for an edgy wedding gown that shows off her ink. Bride Venedra struggles to find a dress with a high-neckline that also covers her scar. New mom, Courtney is nervous her body is not yet bridal ready.

17.title: Gown Defying Expectations
17.plot: Fashionista, Tohni Jean comes to the salon in search of two gowns with very different visions. But will this high-maintenance bride be too much for the Vows team to handle? Becky struggles to get her entourage onboard with her fun vow renewal dress pick.

18.title: That's My Dress!
18.plot: Bride Stacey clings to the idea that only Lazaro gowns will fit her fun personality. Boston Marathon survivor, Danielle is on the hunt for a gown that gives her that perfect, princess bridal moment. Bride Brittany spots her dream dress- on another bride!

1.title: Persistence Makes Perfect
1.plot: Looking for the deal of a lifetime, three brides come to VOWS hoping to find the wedding dress of their dreams!

2.title: The Dress of Her Dreams
2.plot: Amanda is on the hunt for a gown by designer Rosa Clara. Rick & Leslie get lucky on a buying trip, fashionista Tynesha becomes upset when her family doesn't approve of her beaded "Allure" dress. And with only 5 weeks left-will Anna find her wedding dress?

3.title: Vows to the Rescue!
3.plot: Not willing to compromise on style, three brides with strict budgets come to VOWS hoping to score on a designer wedding gown.

4.title: Grandma Approved Gowns
4.plot: Not willing to compromise on style, three brides with strict budgets come to VOWS hoping to score on a designer wedding gown.

5.title: Brides with a Vision
5.plot: A bus-load of brides and their entourages from New York have taken over VOWS in hopes of scoring huge deals on designer wedding gowns. But the brides don't have much time to shop, and must race against the clock before it's time to head back home.

6.title: Bargain Hunting Brides
6.plot: Looking for the deal of a lifetime, three brides come to VOWS in search of dresses that meet both their high standards and tight budgets!

7.title: Saved by the Gown
7.plot: Four budgeted brides come to VOWS in search of designer wedding gowns that will turn heads but won't break the bank.

8.title: Big Opinions, Low Budget
8.plot: The consultants at VOWS spread the love to the three brides who visit the store in search of discount dream dresses.

1.title: Family Knockdowns and Dress Knockouts
1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere, a bride clashes with her aunt, who's an expert on patterns, over her style of dress; a bride wants a gown with a low back; and a bride searches for her ideal designer dress.

2.title: What's Old Might Be New
2.plot: A bride refuses to wear white at her wedding; a bride hopes to incorporate pieces of her mother's 1984 gown; a bride hunts for a bargain on a specific gown.

3.title: Short Skirts and High Hopes
3.plot: A bride wants a runway look for her wedding, while another is very particular about a lace gown. Also: a search to replace a dress that was ruined by Hurricane Sandy.

4.title: Wedding Gown Showdown
4.plot: A bride comes from Virginia to look for a classic, but inexpensive, gown; a bride falls for a dress that makes her consider increasing her budget; a bride's height presents a challenge for the salon's stylist.

5.title: Bling, Bows & Lace
5.plot: Half-hearted bride Becca hopes to find a gown that will put her in the bridal mood. Jersey girl Kelly is looking for a dress that stands out, but is not too flasy or trashy. Michaela and her opiniated mom don't see eye to eye when it comes to couture.

6.title: Road Trippin' Brides
6.plot: A bus load of brides and their entourages comes from New York to look for deals on designer dresses, but the brides' time to shop is limited.

7.title: No Ifs, Ands or Butts!
7.plot: Evelyn has flown in from Alabama with her opinionated entourage to find a gown for her ten year vow renewal. Gina is a coupon fashionista on the hunt for a dress with tons of bling. Bride Ashleigh panics during her fitting when the scissors come out.

8.title: Don't Let the Gown Get You Down
8.plot: Bride Marquita is brought to tears by her maid-of-honor after a disagreement over her dream dress; Ashley is on a tight budget, but still wants to look like a celebrity on her big day. Beth searches for a gown with glitz to match her Vegas wedding.

9.title: Too Much Is Never Enough
9.plot: A New York bride comes to VOWS to purchase two gowns to wear on her wedding day, a Colorado bride travels cross-country for the deal of a lifetime; and a Boston bride hopes her entourage can help her decide between a simple dress or a flashier gown.

10.title: May the Best Dress Win
10.plot: Jametria's lively entourage turns the hunt for a gown into an all out competition. Carol is searching for the perfect golden gown to celebrate her 50th wedding annversay. New consultant Jax, pulls a dress for Kate that goes completely against her vision.

11.title: Big Taste, Small Budget
11.plot: The Vows Crew has their work cut out for them! Jen wants a gown that fits her expensive taste, on her limited budget. Heather has trouble finding the ideal silhouette. Meanwhile, Caroll is counting on Anahit to save her gown in a fitting appointment.

12.title: A Tale of Two Gowns
12.plot: After purchasing three gowns on an impulse buy, Patricia comes to VOWS hoping to find THE dress she can wear on her wedding day.Sharifa wants a gown that shows of her new figure. Christine is on the hunt for two specific designer gowns at the right price.

13.title: Keep Your Eye on the Prize
13.plot: Bargain hunter Jenna is feeling the pressure from both her mom and her fiancé to spend as little on her dress as possible. Bride Jacobi is searching for a bohemian inspired gown for her destination wedding, and Heather is torn between two Lazaro gowns.

14.title: Runway Brides
14.plot: LA bride Jessica is on a quest for a runway-ready gown. Canadian bride Emilia is on the hunt for a killer dress to wear to her Batman-themed wedding. Curvaseous bride Sabrina falls in love with a gown that may not be able to contain her!

15.title: What the Bride Wants
15.plot: Fashionista Michelle struggles to find the perfect dress. Meanwhile, moms throw their weight around as fashion-clueless Amanda flounders in a sea of dresses and Erin seeks a gown fit for a woodland princess.

16.title: For the Love of Mom
16.plot: Bride Natasha searches for a dress that resembles a classic lace gown worn by her late mother. Bride Leah comes to Vow's to track down a dress that represents her ideal shade of white. Bride Rachel is on the hunt for a dress that draws out her emotions.

17.title: Lots of Details, Half the Retail
17.plot: Courtney is searching for a gown to match her mother's veil. Mandy is on the hunt for a gown that accentuates her body. Kiy needs a glamorous gown that works with her curves. Rick and Leslie go to Pearl Bridal to find gowns for their curvy clients.

18.title: Finding the One
18.plot: Ashley is on the hunt for a big ball-gown to wear on her big day, 20-year old Lauren wants a mermaid fit dress with bling, and Bride Inez needs help from Vows to find her a dress for her wedding that's only three days away!

imdb.plot outline: Designer wedding gowns are desirable but not always affordable. Rick and Leslie DeAngelo, owners of VOWS, are back on their continuing mission to change that. From closeouts and back rooms to liquidations and warehouses, no stone goes unturned in their quest for fabulous, yet discounted gowns for bargaining fashionistas and budget-conscious brides.
imdb.title: I Found the Gown
plot: Designer wedding gowns are desirable but not always affordable. Rick and Leslie DeAngelo, owners of VOWS, are back on their continuing mission to change that. From closeouts and back rooms to liquidations and warehouses, no stone goes unturned in their quest for fabulous, yet discounted gowns for bargaining fashionistas and budget-conscious brides.
